Articles.Content: Holding right shift as my mod key no longer works in either 1.0 or 1.0.2, I have to mash both the windows keys and left alt to get it(sometimes)

Please check your settings.cfg, sometimes KSP Linux resets to the Windows default of left Alt.

Reset as necessary
Same thing, I'll check the settings tonight.

MODIFIER_KEY
{
	primary = LeftAlt
	secondary = RightAlt
	group = 0
	modeMask = -1
	modeMaskSec = -1
}

That would be this bit.
Yes that's it, as you can see it's set to both the alt keys, not to left shift, left alt is already in use by Ubuntu and other distros to allow application winds to be grabbed and moved.
